com.vernalis.pdbconnector.config
Class ReportCategory

java.lang.Object
  com.vernalis.pdbconnector.config.ReportCategory

public class ReportCategory
extends java.lang.Object

ReportCategory class. A ReportCategory represents a single named subpanel of the Report Options dialog tab, and contains a collection of related ReportField objects.

See Also:
ReportField

getId

isHidden

public final boolean isHidden()
Checks if this is the hidden report category. The hidden report category is defined by the special name "HIDDEN". This category contains those fields that are added to the report automatically depending on which other fields are selected, and should not be user-selectable in the UI. For example:
  • Structure ID
  • Chain ID

Returns:
true, if is hidden

getLabel

public final java.lang.String getLabel()
Gets the label.

Returns:
the label

Gets the report fields.

Returns:
the report fields
